text_raw:

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving
heading: 3. Regulation 3(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting the
text_raw:
3. Regulation 3(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting the 

following definition after the definition of “medical device”: 

““Minister” means 
Communications.”

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Statutory Instrument amends the European Union (Restriction of Certain 
Hazardous Substances in Electrical and Electronic Equipment) Regulations 2012 
(S.I. No. 513 of 2012) to include a definition of the Minister and to give further 
effect to Directive 2011/65/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council 
of 8 June 2011 on the restriction of the use of certain hazardous substances in 
electrical and electronic equipment, as amended. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [168]
